formatExample:
Title: PO can report bugs
Description: As a Product Owner (PO), I want to be able to report bugs in the system so that they can be addressed promptly.

Acceptance Criteria:
- PO can access the bug reporting feature from the dashboard.
- PO can fill out a form with details of the bug, including description, severity, and steps to reproduce.
- PO can submit the bug report.
- Once submitted, the bug report is logged in the system for the development team to review and prioritize.
- PO receives a confirmation message after successfully submitting the bug report.
